segments.text: Albert ? Could you co-sign this approval sheet ? Accounting ’ s getting really picky .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . They ’ Ve already sent back two approvals I sent them . Where do I sign ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right here . It ’ s for that new fax machine we ’ re getting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , right . I remember . There you are . Hope you don ’ t have as many problems as I had !
segments.speaker: S2
